mapper.select: SELECT order_id, order_date, order_condition, order_delivery, i.item_price as order_price, i.item_method as item_method, c.item_ea as order_ea, c.item_id as item_id, c.my_Id as buyer_id, item_deliveryNo review_star, review_content, review_date, review_pic from ORDERT o, ITEMT i, CART c where i.item_id=o.item_id and i.item_id=#{itemId} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT buyer_id, o.ITEM_ID as ITEM_ID, ORDER_DATE, review_star, review_content, review_date
FROM ORDERT o, ITEMT i where i.item_id = o.item_id and i.item_id = #{itemId} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC
